cast.overview: Raised in a poverty-stricken slum, a 16-year-old girl named Starr now attends a suburban prep school. After she witnesses a police officer shoot her unarmed best friend, she's torn between her two very different worlds as she tries to speak her truth.
cast.title: The Hate U Give

details.biography: Myles Evans is a versatile on-screen and voice actor recognized for his portrayal of Miles Taylor in Netflix's "Teenage Bounty Hunters." His passion for film and television blossomed early, shaping him into an entertainer from the start. He seamlessly translated classroom antics into a craft fit for the silver screen, a skill honed throughout his life.
details.name: Myles Alexander Evans
